amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of HUD to study the effects of the presence of Chinese dry wall on foreclosures and the availability of property insurance for residential structures where Chinese dry wall is present.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 111-98 to require the Secretary of HUD to study the effects of the presence of Chinese dry wall on foreclosures and the availability of property insurance for residential structures where Chinese dry wall is present.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Diaz-Balart, M. amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Diaz-Balart, M..
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Diaz-Balart, M. amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
